title: 'PVC cum Polyester Material'
body: 'The product title is quite misleading to mention as Polyester. The inner layer is of PVC material. The product had a plastic smell when I checked it out and when minutely seeing the description of the product I came to know that the inner material or the reversible checked material is PVC. I preferred a low-cost environment-friendly material for the raincoat but ended up with a PVC cum polyester one so little disappointed. However the product looks good and will surely solve the purpose I think.'

title: 'Pathetic product'
body: I bought this raincoat with a lot of expectations. But, to my astonishment, it turned out to be a worthless product. I have used it twice. During the 1st use, I found that my shirt was wet partially. On 2nd use today, I found that my shirt was wet in various places. What is the use of this raincoat, if I my clothes don't stay dry? Disastrous product.

title: 'Best raincoat to buy under a budget !!'
body: There are lots of high quality raincoats in different sizes available to pick from.. It's comfortable to wear and versatile as well .. Good breathability..it let's you unzip the bottom of your coat to make the fit more comfortable when you're sitting down, and they allow you to just let some air in if you feeling hot .. Roomy pockets that protect hands and items from the rain ..A roomy hood available that's deep enough to keep water off the face .. Lightweight..Overall best raincoat to buy !!!!üòäüëç
